Script.name: TabWindows
Script.script:
-----[ Generate Tab Windows ]----- FEDGUI.tabright_top = FEDGUI.tabright_top or Adjustable.TabWindow:new( { name = "FEDGUI.tabright_top", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", tabBarHeight ="10%", tabs = {"Map"}, color1 = "DimGrey", color2 = "Black", }, FEDGUI.right_top )
FEDGUI.tabright_bottom = FEDGUI.tabright_bottom or Adjustable.TabWindow:new( { name = "FEDGUI.tabright_bottom", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", tabBarHeight ="10%", tabs = {"Comm","Cargo"}, color1 = "DimGrey", color2 = "Black", }, FEDGUI.right_bottom )
FEDGUI.tableft = FEDGUI.tableft or Adjustable.TabWindow:new( { name = "FEDGUI.tableft", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", tabBarHeight ="5%", tabs = {"Exchange"}, color1 = "DimGrey", color2 = "Black", }, FEDGUI.left )
-----[ Populate Tab Windows ]----- mapper = my_mapper or Geyser.Mapper:new( { x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "100%", name="mapper" }, FEDGUI.tabright_top.Mapcenter )
FEDGUI.chatwindow = FEDGUI.chatwindow or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="FEDGUI.chatwindow", x=0, y=0, autoWrap = true, color = "black", scrollBar = false, fontSize = 14, width="100%", height="100%", },FEDGUI.tabright_bottom.Commcenter )
FEDGUI.exchangewindow = FEDGUI.exchangewindow or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="FEDGUI.exchangewindow", x=0, y=0, autoWrap = true, color = "black", scrollBar = false, fontSize = 14, width="100%", height="100%", },FEDGUI.tableft.Exchangecenter )
FEDGUI.cargowindow = FEDGUI.cargowindow or Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="FEDGUI.cargowindow", x=0, y=0, autoWrap = true, color = "black", scrollBar = false, fontSize = 14, width="100%", height="100%", },FEDGUI.tabright_bottom.Cargocenter )
-----[ Load Saved Tab Settings ]----- --FEDGUI.tabwindow:load()
